title: 新官网 Minecraft.net 2.0 已经部署
author: 桃渊林
txt_content:
本帖最后由 hcrgm1 于 2016-5-7 20:30 编辑 

睁大眼睛看清楚啦，请不要误以为 Minecraft 2.0 已经出了！本文讲的是 Minecraft.net 改版了！


有些人还是不愿接受这一事实，还是喜欢那经典风格Σ(°Д°;
Hello!
大家好！
We’ve launched the new  Minecraft.net! Minecraft.net2.0, if you will.
我们已经推出了新的Minecraft.net！Minecraft.net2.0，如果你愿意。
The new site has all the features you might be used to, but it’s prettier and faster. It also scales better on phones, tablets, and neon-lit-ugly-rigs with their monster monitors. Remember that, like everything Mojang, we’re going to be iterating upon this thing for the foreseeable future.
新网站有您过去可能使用过的所有特性，但它变得更漂亮更快速了。它也在手机、平板电脑、【霓虹灯照亮了丑陋的钻机与他们的怪物监视器（什么鬼！）】上的缩放更好了。记住，像Mojang的一切，在可预测的未来，我们将这件事进行迭代。
Though we’re very happy to launch Minecraft.net2.0, it’s worth mentioning that Minecraft.net3.0 is already in the works! That site will focus on exciting things happening in our community and provide deeper insight into the future of Minecraft and our developers. Our plan is to make Minecraft.netinto a place that every player would like to visit once in a while, no matter which platform they play on - somewhere to represent what our game has become over the past few years.
虽然我们对于推出Minecraft.net2.0感到非常高兴，但值得一提的是，Minecraft.net3.0已经在开发！在Minecraft和我们的开发者的未来，这个网站将专注于发生在我们 的社区的令人兴奋的事情和提供更深入的了解。我们的计划是让 Minecraft.net 成为一个地方，每位玩家都想去参观，无论是在哪个平台，在过去几年我们的游戏已经代表着某些地方。
But that’s some time in the future. For now, enjoy the new stylin’!
但这是在未来的一段时间。现在，请享受新款式吧！
Have a lovely day, internet!
祝互联网有个可爱的一天吧！
Owen - @bopogamel
